department.dept_long_name: Committee on the Study of Religion

course.title: Introduction to Buddhist Scriptural Anthologies and their Critical Interpretations
course.description: An introduction to basic issues in reading Buddhist Scriptural Anthologies, both historical and hermeneutic. Special emphasis will be given to issues of intertextuality that the formation of scriptural anthologies generates. Examples of Buddhist scriptural anthologies will be drawn from across the Buddhist world.
course.notes: Offered jointly with the Divinity School as 3800.
